org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.nfc

Class AndroidNfcReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.keyple.util.Observable<T>
      • org.eclipse.keyple.seproxy.plugin.AbstractObservableReader
        • org.eclipse.keyple.seproxy.plugin.AbstractLocalReader
          • org.eclipse.keyple.seproxy.plugin.AbstractSelectionLocalReader
            • org.eclipse.keyple.plugin.android.nfc.AndroidNfcReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.nfc.NfcAdapter.ReaderCallback, java.lang.Comparable<org.eclipse.keyple.seproxy.SeReader>, org.eclipse.keyple.seproxy.event.ObservableReader, org.eclipse.keyple.seproxy.message.ProxyReader, org.eclipse.keyple.seproxy.SeReader, org.eclipse.keyple.util.Configurable, org.eclipse.keyple.util.Nameable

    public final class AndroidNfcReader
extends org.eclipse.keyple.seproxy.plugin.AbstractSelectionLocalReader
implements android.nfc.NfcAdapter.ReaderCallback
    Implementation of SeReader to communicate with NFC Tag though Android NfcAdapter Configure NFCAdapter Protocols with setParameter(String, String)

      void setParameter(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      Configure NFC Reader AndroidNfcReader supports the following parameters : FLAG_READER: SKIP_NDEF_CHECK (skip NDEF check when a smartcard is detected) FLAG_READER: NO_PLATFORM_SOUNDS (disable device sound when nfc smartcard is detected) EXTRA_READER_PRESENCE_CHECK_DELAY: "Int" (see @NfcAdapter.EXTRA_READER_PRESENCE_CHECK_DELAY)

      • setParameter

        public void setParameter(java.lang.String key,
                         java.lang.String value)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Configure NFC Reader AndroidNfcReader supports the following parameters : FLAG_READER: SKIP_NDEF_CHECK (skip NDEF check when a smartcard is detected) FLAG_READER: NO_PLATFORM_SOUNDS (disable device sound when nfc smartcard is detected) EXTRA_READER_PRESENCE_CHECK_DELAY: "Int" (see @NfcAdapter.EXTRA_READER_PRESENCE_CHECK_DELAY)
        Specified by:
        setParameter in interface org.eclipse.keyple.util.Configurable
        Parameters:
        key - the parameter key
        value - the parameter value
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • onTagDiscovered

        public void onTagDiscovered(android.nfc.Tag tag)
        Callback function invoked by @NfcAdapter when a @Tag is discovered A TagTransceiver is created based on the Tag technology see TagProxy.getTagProxy(Tag) Do not call this function directly.
        Specified by:
        onTagDiscovered in interface android.nfc.NfcAdapter.ReaderCallback
        Parameters:
        tag - : detected tag
